Title: GZCO dapat tambahan lahan | IDNFinancials
Content(RAW):
GZCO - PT. Gozco Plantations Tbk Rp 147 +3 (+2,00%) Info Selengkapnya!

JAKARTA - PT Gozco Plantations Tbk (GZCO) akan mendapat tambahan lahan perkebunan 9.610 hektare (Ha) dan tanaman menghasilkan 3.154 Ha dari PT Sinar Karya Mandiri (SKM). Tambahan lahan itu pasca anak usahanya, PT Suryabumi Agrolanggeng (SA) menyetorkan modal senilai Rp 190 miliar ke SKM, kemarin (18/12).



Dalam keterbukaan informasi dikutip Selasa (19/12), setoran modal SA yang diterima SKM merujuk kepada putusan sirkules para pemegang saham SKM, kemarin (18/12). Nilai setoran modal itu kisaran 16,5% dari ekuitas GZCO per Desember 2022 sebesar Rp 1,15 triliun.



Setoran modal SA ke SKM dilakukan pasca GZCO mengakhiri kesepakatan pembelian obligasi wajib konversi tanpa kupon (mandatory convertable bond) senilai Rp 150 miliar dengan City Peak Development Limited (City), Hongkong. Para pihak yang bertransaksi tiak memiliki ailiasi. (LK)
Content(EN):
Terminasi dan Merger' pada SA dan SKM dengan cara merger SA ke SKM, di mana seluruh hak milik SA akan diserahkan kepada SKM.

Translation:
GZCO - PT. Gozco Plantations Tbk Rp 147+3 (+2.00%) More Information!
JAKARTA - PT Gozco Plantations Tbk (GZCO) will receive additional lands of 9,610 hectares (Ha) and producing plants of 3,154 Ha from PT Sinar Karya Mandiri (SKM). The additional land is after its subsidiary, PT Suryabumi Agrolanggeng (SA) paid capital of Rp 190 billion to SKM, yesterday (18/12).

In the disclosure information quoted Tuesday (19/12), the capital payment received by SKM from SA refers to the' Termination and Merger 'circular on SA and SKM by way of merger SA to SKM, where all SA ownership rights will be transferred to SKM. For the shareholders of SKM, yesterday (18/12), the capital contribution is around 16.5% of GZCO's equity as of December 2022, valued at Rp 1.15 trillion.
The capital contribution from SA to SKM was conducted after GZCO completed the transaction of purchasing a Rp 150 billion mandatory convertable bond without coupon from City Peak Development Limited (City), Hong Kong. The parties involved had no affiliations. (LK)
